level.heading: Revenue bonds, notes, or other obligations.
Emergency Legislation
level.text: For temporary (90 day) amendment of section, see § 2 of NCRC and AWC Debt Acquisition Delegation Authority Emergency Amendment Act of 2006 (D.C. Act 16-405, June 26, 2006, 53 DCR 5417).

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 12-144
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 12-144, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 2-1219.01.
